game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient relic from the lost temple.
game.description: The village elder has received a vision of an ancient relic hidden within the lost temple. The village is in dire need of its power to restore balance to the land. You must retrieve the relic and return it to the village elder.

task.description: Make your way through the dense jungle and navigate through the ancient ruins to reach the entrance of the lost temple.

task.objective: Obtain the map fragment from the hidden chamber.
task.description: Sneak into the hidden chamber and retrieve the map fragment that will lead you to the relic.
Face your fears and defeat the powerful temple guardian that protects the relic.
Use the map fragment to navigate through the temple and retrieve the ancient relic.
